comments.body: sort of related: we probably have to take another stab at optimizing those tests. I’ve seen a few timeouts recently.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1104,1108 @@        withCurrentDirectory (tmpDir </> "proj") $
            callProcessSilent damlc ["build"]

    -- TODO https://github.com/digital-asset/daml/issues/8020

comments.body: hopefully the test should tell us that by failing but I guess the todo doesn’t do any harm.

I think we should probably refactor all of this (in a separate PR).
"numStablePackages" should be derived from a list of stable packages.
